description:
Chopper`s heroism may mean the difference between life and death for Iceberg and Paulie, Nami learns the agonizing truth about Robin, and Sanji prepares to make his move!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La vérité derrière la trahison ! Le douloureux choix de Robin !
The Truth Behind Her Betrayal! Robin`s Sorrowful Decision!
Uragiri no Shinsou! Robin no Kanashiki Ketsui!
裏切りの真相! ロビンの哀しき決意!
